ModMetaData.name: Glass + Lights Extended
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
Note that the original mod is not my work. I only added a new bigger outdoor lamp to it with this mod for my super large bases and gardens.
- Performance impact: Unknown - Mod is XML only and overwrites nothing. - Can safely be added to an existing game. - Can safely be removed from an existing game providing you delete all structures from this mod first. - Requires the "Glass+Lights" mod loaded BEFORE this mod.
